magpie.optimization.oracles

Class BaseOracle

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.optimization.oracles.BaseOracle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Options
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LookupOracle

    public abstract class BaseOracle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Options
    Interface for all Oracle classes, which manage the evaluation of new entries (useful for optimization algorithms)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      protected Dataset ToEvaluate
      Dataset containing entries currently being evaluated

    • Method Detail

      • importDataset

        public void importDataset(Dataset NewData)
        Adds a new dataset to be evaluated. Throws error if this Oracle is already working on something.
        Parameters:
        NewData - Dataset of entries to be evaluated

      • extractDataset

        public Dataset extractDataset()
        If the oracle is finished, returns the dataset with all evaluated entries. Sets ToEvaluate back to null, allowing for the Oracle to receive a new set of data.
        Returns:
        Reference to to evaluated dataset

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Check whether every entry has been evaluated
        Returns:
        Whether each entry in ToEvaluate has a measured class

      • evaluateEntries

        public void evaluateEntries()
        Run all necessary calculations to determine the measured class of each entry Throws error if no entries have been imported

      • evaluate_protected

        protected abstract void evaluate_protected()
        Operation which actually does the work

        public BaseOracle clone()
